> 5 hours ago, Starhelperdude said:
> 
> 
> how do I add stuff at my post? like [@Deddly](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/62955-deddly/) with ''Deedly Design in the MNSP,(...)''?
> 

That's an easy fix. You cannot do it on a mobile device, however.

1. Go to the upper right corner where it has your user name. Let your cursor hover there.
2. From the drop-down menu, select **Account Settings*.***
3. On the left of the new screen, you will see several options. One has the icon of a pencil with the word **Signature**. Click it.
4. Make sure the toggle is slid to the right. Should see a blue toggle background. If not change it.
5. Edit your signature until your heart's content. Then click **Save.**
